result.arabic_text: لَٰكِنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوۡاْ رَبَّهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا نُزُلٗا مِّنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۗ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلۡأَبۡرَارِ
result.translation: Garuu isaan Gooftaa isaanii sodaatan isaaniif ashaakiltiilee laggeen ishee jala yaatutu jira, ishee keessatti hafoodha. Affeerraa Rabbiin biraa ta’e (affeeraman). Waan Rabbin biraatu qulqullootaaf caalaadha.
